name: Bamboo Toothbrush
description: Compostable handle with soft plant-based bristles. Switch from plastic to bamboo for a lower-waste brush.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Durable and reusable bottle to reduce reliance on single-use plastics.

name: Reusable Shopping Bag
description: A strong, reusable bag made from certified organic cotton.

name: Metal Straw Set
description: A set of durable metal straws with a cleaning brush, reducing plastic waste.

name: Silicone Food Wraps
description: Stretchy silicone wraps that create a tight seal for food storage.

name: Wool Dryer Balls
description: Reduces drying time and softens clothes naturally, replacing chemical-laden dryer sheets.

name: Eco-Friendly Cleaning Spray
description: A powerful multi-surface cleaner made with natural, biodegradable ingredients.

name: Shampoo Bar
description: A concentrated solid bar that lathers like a liquid, without the plastic bottle.

name: Silicone Reusable Bags
description: A set of airtight, reusable bags for food storage, freezing, and cooking.

name: Biodegradable Phone Case
description: A durable phone case that will break down completely in a home compost.

name: Bamboo Cotton Swabs
description: Swabs with bamboo sticks, perfect for a no-plastic bathroom.

name: Reusable Coffee Cup
description: Lightweight and stylish cup to enjoy your coffee on the go.

name: Compostable Trash Bags
description: Strong, tear-resistant bags that break down in commercial composting facilities.

name: Glass Food Containers
description: Airtight, microwave-safe containers for meal prep and food storage.

name: Eco-friendly Deodorant
description: A natural, long-lasting deodorant in a compostable cardboard tube.

name: Biodegradable Sponges
description: Durable and absorbent sponges that won't release microplastics into the environment.

name: Plantable Seed Cards
description: Cards embedded with wildflower seeds. After use, simply plant the card and watch it grow.

name: Bamboo Toilet Paper
description: Soft and strong toilet paper made from fast-growing bamboo, not trees.
